metadata.title: CVE-2022-3663 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4. It has been rated asproblematic. This issue affects the function AP4_StsdAtom of the fileAp4StsdAtom.cpp of the component MP4fragment. The manipulation leads tonull pointer dereference. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploithas been disclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifierof this vulnerability is VDB-212003.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
